item.title: About Me & This Site
item.description: ME: Maruyama Yume 丸山（まるやま） 夢（ゆめ） // aka. @kirainmoe, @AyAmita 目前于 厦门大学信息学院 就读计算机科学专业. 昵称受启发于 BanG Dream! 企划中的角色 丸山彩. Skills C/C++/Golang(✽), PHP(✽✽), Javascript/Node(✽✽✽). Used to be a Front-End. A newbee in CCPC / ICPC. Technical geek. Experience 2016.4 ~ 2018.9, Zhangzhou No.1 Middle School OI Team. 2018.11 ~ 2019.11, Xiamen Univeristy ACM Team, as a member of xmu_otaku_trinity with @RealR and @Donald.John.Trump. Participated in 2019 China Collegiate Programming Contest, Qinghuangdao Site / Bronze Medal (2019.
